reviews: Extremely affordable... they were able to cover it perfectly without having to remove the bumper and do a complete repaint job.
Call Car found a place in Nevada to straighten and re-chrome the existing bumper; it looks as good as new!
They took an almost totaled car and made it brand new, were constantly communicative, and dealt with the insurance effortlessly.
shops.shop_name: Call Car Collision - Auto Body Shop

reviews: They took care of literally everything... Joel even let me borrow a shop car while the car was being fixed with no extra cost! When the car was returned, I was shocked! The car looked practically brand new.
The whole team was so helpful from guiding me through my first insurance claim to doing a beautiful job with repairing the car. My Honda looks better than new, both inside and out!
Everyone is incredibly friendly and makes you feel welcome from the moment you walk in. Joel was the employee who helped me, and he treated me like family.
shops.hours_of_operation: Mon–Fri 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM | Sat 9:00 AM – 12:00 PM | Sun Closed

reviews: Bismark was incredibly friendly, professional, and communicative... he even offered to get my car smog-checked while it was being repaired.
Bismark replaced and painted the front fender and bumper and repaired and painted the hood and driver door to match. It now looks like a brand new car.
Bismark is the BEST!... he even let me borrow his car to go around while mine was being fixed.
shops.hours_of_operation: Mon–Fri 8:00 AM – 6:00 PM | Sat 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM | Sun Closed

reviews: Tony helped identify hidden damage and made sure my car came back in excellent condition... Shannon provides great customer service.
They seamlessly managed the entire process, from arranging for me to Enterprise Rent-A-Car to keeping me updated every step of the way.
Tony and the team at West Wind are professional and practice excellent craftsmanship.
They absolutely brought it back to life... the whole process was super smooth.
Less than 5 days later—like brand new! Highly recommended!!
It was seamless... I couldn't even tell where they repaired it.
Denny was calm, communicative and kind... handled everything with my State Farm insurance which took a huge weight off my shoulders.
Denny gave me a much more realistic quote... the work was completed several hours later. They also washed my car!
They provide a towing service in case your car gets totaled or immobilized.
Kai is incredibly kind, honest, and professional... they even cleaned my car before returning it and it looked better than when I dropped it off.
Kai was incredibly friendly, helpful, and professional... the entire repair process was fast and easy.
Kai was super flexible, helpful, and honest... they had the car ready faster than expected.
shops.hours_of_operation: Mon–Fri 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM | Sat 10:30 AM – 1:00 PM | Sun Closed

reviews: They were quick and professional and did all the backend work with my insurance.
Chose this place because it is Tesla approved... service, communication and auto repair to be exceptional.
Greg is friendly and informative. They are one of State Farm's preferred members.
Will's Auto Body Shop does the BEST WORK, for the BEST PRICE, and they are SUPER FRIENDLY and HONEST.
Romeo and Martin... less than 24 hours my car is looking brand new!!
Romeo even repaired a few dings that was not included in the estimate to make the job look perfect.
shops.hours_of_operation: Mon–Fri 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM | Sat 8:00 AM – 12:00 PM | Sun Closed

reviews: They not only fixed it beautifully but also gave it a fresh paint job that makes it look brand new... finished the repairs ahead of schedule!
They did incredibly, on time, on budget, and even had me come back to fix the unrelated door lock as a courtesy.
They didn't charge me a single dollar for fixing a low-pressure tire and checked all other tires for safety.
shops.hours_of_operation: Mon–Fri 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM | Sat 10:00 AM – 2:00 PM | Sun Closed

reviews: My car looked brand new!! EVERY BIT that the Selecta Auto Team touched/worked on turned to Gold... it was PURELY A VIP EXPERIENCE.
The team was incredibly prompt, getting the work done faster than I expected without sacrificing quality.
Such professionalism and care towards, not only the car but also to me.
Finally a mechanic you can trust!... they sent me a report of the findings and their work.
They matched the paint color perfectly... I would greatly recommend this shop.
They offer so much than just car repairs for insurance claims such as car detailing, paint touch ups.
shops.shop_name: Veloce Collision - Body shop - Auto Repair - PPG Certified Paint

san_francisco__california__united_states.damage_description: Car damage analysis: Front view of a wrecked dark green car, with a crushed front and a detached license plate, set on a street with brick buildings in the background, daytime lighting.. This vehicle requires repair services for the visible damage.
